scripts.build: npx tsc && cp src/types.d.ts dist/types/types.d.ts && npx rollup --c
scripts.dev:prepare: rm -rf playground && git clone https://github.com/kinde-starter-kits/kinde-auth-remix-starter-kit.git playground && npm link && cd playground && mv .env.sample .env && npm uninstall @kinde-oss/kinde-auth-remix-sdk && rm -rf .git && npm link @kinde-oss/kinde-auth-remix-sdk
